text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-11
    CodeDisplay
    XM21H2Measles, combinations with rubella, live attenuated
    XM8TF3Measles, combinations with mumps and rubella, live attenuated
    XM4AJ8Measles, combinations with mumps, rubella and varicella, live attenuated
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    30940-1Measles virus+Mumps virus+Rubella virus dose count in combination vaccine

name: IMMZ_Z_DE32
title: IMMZ.Z.DE.32	Measles and rubella containing vaccines
description: Vaccine terminology codes for Measles and rubella containing vaccines.
